title: How to Have Fun With a Reborn Baby Doll

steps.headline: Make them a bottle.
steps.description: There are many videos on YouTube on how to make a bottle you can use for your doll.

steps.headline: Make them a pacifier.
steps.description: There are many videos on YouTube on how to make a pacifier for your doll. If your doll does not have a magnet, no worries! You can make a putty pacifier for them.

steps.headline: Buy them things.
steps.description: You can spend how much money you want. You can go to good will, or go to the mall or Target. You don't have to spend a bunch of money. Buy some toddler or baby clothes, baby bottles, girl and boy pacifiers, blankets, diapers, a deluxe Stroller, a booster seat, etc.

steps.headline: Take them out in public with you if you're comfortable doing so.
steps.description: It can be a very fun experience for you to have fun with him/her.

steps.headline: Get them a crib, a booster seat, sleep time bouncer, baby bottle etc.
steps.description: You can even make your own home made crib. There are many videos on YouTube on how to make your own doll crib. You can even get regular doll cribs or hand made doll cribs made for reborn dolls or reborn toddlers.

steps.headline: If you want to treat your doll as a real baby, then go for it!
steps.description: Not everyone does, but some people do treat them like real babies. Some Mommies like doing this in their life and being able to feel like a real mom to a real child. If you want to do that, make sure to get the right things like diapers and Strollers, Booster seats to take them on car rides in.

steps.headline: Make a YouTube channel!
steps.description: A lot of people make videos of their Reborns/Realistic dolls on YouTube! Check into it. Once you have one set up start taking video requests for different videos you could do like a night routine with my reborn toddler or day in the life of my reborn or toddler.

steps.headline: Play around with them!
steps.description: Dress them, change their diaper when they need a diaper change, even give them a fresh bottle of milk. Just try to be an awesome mommy to your reborn baby doll or toddler. Like for example: take them to the park in their stroller, feed them a bottle for the day or afternoon. Always make sure to put them down for a peaceful nap and give them their pacifier before you lay them down for a nap. "if you have a boyfriend, make sure he is aware that you are doing this for your Channel or cause you love playing with reborns and it helps you feel like a mom to a real child".

steps.headline: Try to meet other reborn/realistic doll lover people!
steps.description: You can share your passion for this hobby. You can go to doll shows together, or just show off your dolls to each other! Having a friend with the same hobby makes this hobby more fun and interesting.

steps.headline: Check out Paradise Galleries, and Ashton Drake Galleries.
steps.description: You can even just get a Berenguer doll or a regular play doll. There are also toddler reborns and alternative punk reborn dolls. There are even silicone dolls. This hobby is endless, so do your research!

text: Make them a bottle. There are many videos on YouTube on how to make a bottle you can use for your doll. Make them a pacifier. There are many videos on YouTube on how to make a pacifier for your doll. If your doll does not have a magnet, no worries! You can make a putty pacifier for them. Buy them things. Buy some toddler or baby clothes, baby bottles, girl and boy pacifiers, blankets, diapers, a deluxe Stroller, a booster seat, etc. Take them out in public with you if you're comfortable doing so. It can be a very fun experience for you to have fun with him/her. Get them a crib, a booster seat, sleep time bouncer, baby bottle etc. You can even make your own home made crib. There are many videos on YouTube on how to make your own doll crib. You can even get regular doll cribs or hand made doll cribs made for reborn dolls or reborn toddlers. If you want to treat your doll as a real baby, then go for it! Not everyone does, but some people do treat them like real babies. Some Mommies like doing this in their life and being able to feel like a real mom to a real child. If you want to do that, make sure to get the right things like diapers and Strollers, Booster seats to take them on car rides in. Make a YouTube channel! A lot of people make videos of their Reborns/Realistic dolls on YouTube! Check into it. Once you have one set up start taking video requests for different videos you could do like a night routine with my reborn toddler or day in the life of my reborn or toddler. Play around with them! Dress them, change their diaper when they need a diaper change, even give them a fresh bottle of milk. Just try to be an awesome mommy to your reborn baby doll or toddler. Like for example: take them to the park in their stroller, feed them a bottle for the day or afternoon. Always make sure to put them down for a peaceful nap and give them their pacifier before you lay them down for a nap. "if you have a boyfriend, make sure he is aware that you are doing this for your Channel or cause you love playing with reborns and it helps you feel like a mom to a real child". Try to meet other reborn/realistic doll lover people! You can share your passion for this hobby. You can go to doll shows together, or just show off your dolls to each other! Having a friend with the same hobby makes this hobby more fun and interesting. Check out Paradise Galleries, and Ashton Drake Galleries. You can even just get a Berenguer doll or a regular play doll. There are also toddler reborns and alternative punk reborn dolls. There are even silicone dolls. This hobby is endless, so do your research!
